foods.name: Tofurkey
foods.method: Stir fry onion & garlic first, then add the tofu which is cut in small pieces, cook for few min

foods.name: Lentil-stew
foods.method: Boil water & onion then add the lentil and boil it for few min, serve it as needed

foods.name: Fried-spinach-mushroom
foods.method: Garlic fry the spinach & mushroom and serve it with either taco or pasta

foods.name: Fruit-salad
foods.method: Cut mango & guava or any other fruits & serve it
